resources.string: You don\'t have any saves yet!!

Conway's game of life is a cellular automaton. That means you touch blocks to form patterns and then press play to see how the pattern you entered evolves over time! Most patterns will die quickly or not do anything, but some can provide really interesting displays. Although this isn't super related, I thought it was interesting that Conway's Game of Life technically qualifies as a Turing complete machine! 

 If you're interested in learning more, check out the wikipedia page: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conway%27s_Game_of_Life 

 Music is: Chillin Hard courtesy of: Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
